page.title: 17RECREATION(CONT.)
page.content: Popular computer games include'The Mine','Wheelie','Space Invaders', 'Pacman'&'Bullseye'.'Jet-Set Willey' uses controls to guide a boy around rooms.The aim being to safely get round the rooms & reach the bedroom. The player has 8 lives to collect for example toys,while avoiding razor blades & scissors etc.When all have been collected the player is allowed into the bedroom & to bed.Many popular playground games are of the'chase & catch'variety eg.'The A-TEAM','Hide & Seek','Tiggy'&'Kiss chase'.In 'Break out'one person the chaser & the other people hold onto his fingers & run. The chaser aims to catch them all.If a player is caught he is sent to 'post' but can freed by another player.When all players are caught the first person 'Tigged' becomes the chaser. Board games include'Monopoly'&'Chess'.
